allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
test: Add unit tests to improve coverage for VoyageMultimodalEmbedder

Add comprehensive unit tests with mocking to cover:
- Content conversion \(_convert_content_item\) for all types:
  - String passthrough
  - ByteStream to PIL Image conversion
  - PIL Image passthrough  
  - Video object passthrough
  - Unsupported type error handling
- Input preparation with mixed content types
- Run method with mocked API client
- All optional parameters \(input_type, output_dimension, output_dtype\)
- Batch processing with multiple API calls
- Image content handling
- Environment variable initialization \(VOYAGE_TIMEOUT, VOYAGE_MAX_RETRIES\)

This significantly improves unit test coverage for the multimodal embedder
from ~54% to better coverage by testing the actual embedding logic paths
without requiring real API calls.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
